qr_generated.description: User generated a QR code from the payment form

format_selected.description: User switched the QR format (BySquare / EPC)

qr_downloaded.description: User downloaded the generated QR code as PNG

qr_copied.description: User copied the QR code image to clipboard

qr_shared.description: User used the native Web Share API to share the QR code

share_link_copied.description: User copied the shareable payment link from the share dialog

shared_qr_downloaded.description: Recipient downloaded the QR code from the shared payment page

shared_qr_copied.description: Recipient copied the QR code from the shared payment page

qr_branding_applied.description: User applied custom branding (colors, text, logo) to the QR code

logo_uploaded.description: User uploaded a custom logo for the QR code center

branding_reset.description: User reset branding settings to defaults

branding_template_saved.description: User saved current branding config as a reusable template

branding_template_loaded.description: User loaded a previously saved branding template

branding_template_deleted.description: User deleted a saved branding template

history_entry_named.description: User assigned a custom name to a payment history entry

history_entry_unnamed.description: User removed the custom name from a history entry

history_item_selected.description: User loaded a previous payment from history into the form

bulk_csv_uploaded.description: User uploaded a CSV file for bulk QR generation

bulk_sample_csv_downloaded.description: User downloaded the sample CSV template

bulk_qr_generated.description: Bulk QR codes were generated from uploaded CSV

bulk_exported_zip.description: User exported bulk QR codes as a ZIP archive

bulk_exported_pdf.description: User exported bulk QR codes as a PDF document

bulk_printed.description: User printed bulk QR codes via browser print dialog

feature_request_opened.description: User opened the feature request / feedback dialog

feature_request_submitted.description: User successfully submitted a feature request

consent_banner_dismissed.description: User dismissed the cookie/analytics consent banner
